email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider a rate in the low $50s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $50.75 per metric ton, considering our long-standing relationship. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is acceptable, but could we adjust the laytime to 96 hours? The cargo loading process might take longer due to recent port congestion. Let me know if this is feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed your request with the vessel owner, and we can extend the laytime to 96 hours. However, the demurrage rate will remain at $25,000 per day. If this works for you, I’ll prepare the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Let’s finalize the laycan as 15-20 October and the freight rate at $50.75 per metric ton. Thanks for your flexibility. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the freight rate is $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
